channel.title: [508] Npc combat help [508]
channel.description: ok so far i got the player to attack the npc, then added correct animation, was working on adding specs but i want to make the npc attack back, how can i do it,(btw this is all done in NPCAttack packet), i saw a part of a code on strickens tutorial(on R~S) i tried it out but when i attack the npc i get kicked. with love, xxx123xxx.
